summary: Absolutely necessary to complete one's Elder Scrolls V: Goyrim experience.
descriptionHtml:
Come one, come all, to the greatest mod on Earth! Yes, that's right, shekels are finally here! I know, you can hardly contain yourselves, but please wait until I'm done to cream your pants.

What does this mod do?

- Changes the name of "gold" to "shekel"
- Changes the name of "coin purse" to "shekel pouch"

Originally, I had planned to go full retard and put the merchant on the coin as well, but that's a lot of work and I'm too lazy to go through with it.

Installation:

place "shekel.esp" in the Data folder, then you will become a good gentile.

Uninstall:

remove "shekel.esp" from the Data folder, then you will go back to being a filthy goyim.

I supposed I ought to throw down a disclaimer of some sort: No offense is intended by this mod, it's a joke that I made for myself and decided to throw up here as well.

Other: I know there's a mod on the steam workshop that does the same thing, but it only affects the coins iirc, which is only half the battle. I doubt I'll add any updates to this, unless I bother to learn how to change the UI on the inventory screen to say shekels instead of gold as well. Also, I had no idea what this General Sam/Shekelstein is before making this mod, if you're wondering, the idea came through divine inspiration. Finally, feel free to do what you wish with this mod, it's none of my business anyway, just throw some credit (if applicable) is all I ask.
author: Karl Marx
